title: Chadian ex-dictator faces victims in court
text:
Published By: Philly News Nation/World - Today 
JOHANNESBURG, South Africa - He was our man in Africa. Hissene Habre, who ruled Chad in the 1980s, was a U.S. ally in good standin...
